briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Efficacy of ALKS 3831 on Body Weight in Young Adults Who Have Been Recently Diagnosed With Schizophrenia, Schizophreniform, or Bipolar I Disorder
officialTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Effect of ALKS 3831 Compared to Olanzapine on Body Weight in Young Adults With Schizophrenia, Schizophreniform, or Bipolar I Disorder Who Are Early in Their Illness
summary: This study will evaluate the effect of ALKS 3831 compared to olanzapine on body weight in young adults with schizophrenia, schizophreniform, or bipolar I disorder who are early in their illness

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Body Weight at Week 12
